website_summaries.verdict: Helps golfers who tend to slice the ball, as the club's weighting and design will encourage a draw ball flight.
pros: Slicing (where the ball goes right of target) is a common problem among golfers, and this new driver uses the latest technology to counteract a slicing swing
Has an aerodynamic design that helps you generate more club head speed
cons: Expensive, but not out of line

customer_reviews.title: great distance. if you fade your shots this corrects it
customer_reviews.text: the draw club face solved 20 years of fade to slice on my shots. lowered my handicap 6 strokes by being able to play out of the middle of the fairway I highly recommend this club
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Straighten out that slice!
customer_reviews.text: I’m hitting the ball straighter and longer with this club. It’s removed a lot of strokes from my game. The draw has completely removed the slice off the tee from my game.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Best Driver I've ever had !
customer_reviews.text: Came looking brand new all wrapped in plastic . I adjusted to 9.5 degree with the Draw on and I am getting 50 yds plus longer on Drives . Great driver easy to adjust comes with tool . Best Driver I've ever had !
customer_reviews.author: Bob Green

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe the condition it came in! Was listed as very good but looked as though it has never been touched. Very pleased with price and product. Took the new driver for a spin and was surprised by the difference it made. First time going with a callaway driver and think I'll continue to go with them in future.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy parrish

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: replacement for x2 hot Not a huge improvement but pleased with results
customer_reviews.author: AussieNU

customer_reviews.title: Great company, great product, better than advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Driver was in good shape better than advertised. Came will all the necessary items, head cover, wrench, etc. The only thing better would be if it came with the weights.
customer_reviews.author: Jj

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: The higher loft of 13.5 plus the fact it’s a draw biased driver cured my slice! I now have high hopes for this golf season! My drives are now going center, slight fade!
customer_reviews.author: Brenden Curry

customer_reviews.title: Great club
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived just as described. It was like new at a way better price.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: The Callaway Rouge Driver
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the fact that the driver I ordered was not the one I got. I ordered a Callaway Rouge Draw with a 9.5 face angle. I got the Callaway Rouge with a 13.5. While I was originally unhappy when I didn't get what I ordered, I have since learned to love it. My drives go about 20 yards further, and my bad slice is now a pretty fade.
customer_reviews.author: joe montano

customer_reviews.title: Great club overall!
customer_reviews.text: This club is great. Warning, it does not sound like a traditional driver. it's more of a thunk than a ping, but if you can get over the sound, it plays great. It sounds a bit like a composite baseball bat.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Conwell

customer_reviews.title: Best used hands down!
customer_reviews.text: Used Callaway does not mean abused. These are in excellent shape, I wonder if they even seen a golf range at all! Will buy from again!! Very happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's excellent!
customer_reviews.text: The driver was in very good condition, looks like new and hits great.
customer_reviews.author: Claudie J Kitchens

customer_reviews.title: Just as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: I love this driver, it has increased my drives 15 yards.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations.
customer_reviews.text: The driver arrived in like new condition. I’ve played only once with it, but very pleased so far!
customer_reviews.author: William J. Hutto

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on a fantastic club
customer_reviews.text: Club showed up ahead of schedule and has been outstanding. This driver added a ton of distance and, unlike some buyers, I have been impressed by how straight the ball flight is
customer_reviews.author: Ryne Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Great club
customer_reviews.text: Club looks great and is awesome, farther drives and better accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Great looking driver
customer_reviews.text: Golf club was new condition. And received on time. Now if I can only play good.
customer_reviews.author: ralph pope

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Club arrived on time in better than expected condition. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Luke Moussalli

customer_reviews.title: A driver that will give you confidence stepping up to the tee.
customer_reviews.text: Driver has improved my fairways hit by 20% as well as added 10 yards to overall distance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I like the whole driver Very Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jude Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Unreal distance
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a Ping G30 draw driver and it is very forgiving, but my distance was sort of bleh with it. I consistently hit my 13.5 loft draw rogue driver with a fubuki shaft about 30 to 40 yards further than my G30. It is just unreal how the ball explodes off the face of this club. However, I agree that I would avoid the 10.5 if your a mid to high handicapper and go to the 13.5. It has great distance, good height, and is extremely forgiving on poorly struck balls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most forgiving and best driver I have ever hit
customer_reviews.text: Longer and straighter than my SLDR. Most forgiving and best driver I have ever hit. Get fitted for one. Just hit 12 of 13 fairways with it. Only miss was in the right rough and with my SLDR it would have been in the woods.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Callaway Golf Men's Rogue Draw Driver
product_meta.description: Golf Digest 2018 Hot List Gold Medal Winner! Repositioned weight in the Rogue Draw Driver enhances the gear effect to promote a distance-enhancing shot shape.
feature_bullets: Jailbreak Effect for Enhanced Ball Speed
Triaxial Carbon Crown and New Head Shape for Increased MOI
Premium Shaft Selection at Multiple Weights
